meanings.definition: Not relating to a particular ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a variety of nonethnic dishes from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Her style was nonethnic, drawing inspiration from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The nonethnic music playlist at the party had everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: His nonethnic background allowed him to easily adapt to new environments.
meanings.sent5: The painting showcased a beautiful nonethnic landscape.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of a particular ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The company promoted a nonethnic dress code to encourage individuality.
meanings.sent2: The art exhibition featured nonethnic artworks that appealed to a diverse audience.
meanings.sent3: The nonethnic fashion trend caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her nonethnic approach to cooking blended flavors in unique ways.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in a nonethnic style, combining modern and traditional elements.
